Posted By: Jayska (1/22/2013 7:42:36 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It's a Human ,it's a Soldier,it's a Defender, it has Extort, he can kill any 1 toughness creature on block. i see a good use of [Basilica Guards](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basilica Guards) in many ways. example: you have 3 [War Falcon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=War Falcon) on the battlefield, on your third turn u cast [Basilica Guards](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basilica Guards) all 3 of your birds can attack and you got a defender on, turn 4 you cast any cheap spell maybe another [War Falcon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=War Falcon) and you can Extort for extra damage.   
I find this card very fun to use and opposed to [Guardians of Akrasa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Guardians of Akrasa) with Exalted i think [Basilica Guards](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basilica Guards) has far more uses as common card Defender creature mostly because of Extort. Definitely none may pass for free!  
5/5 rating from me.

I find this card very fun to use and opposed to Guardians of Akrasa with Exalted i think Basilica Guards has far more uses as common card Defender creature mostly because of Extort. Definitely none may pass for free!
5/5 rating from me.

Posted By: AngelicVamp (1/24/2013 7:45:55 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
A 1/4 body is usually dull for 3 mana ([Horned Turtle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Horned Turtle) noob days ftw!), but I do have to say that it blends pretty well with the extort mechanic, since one of your main goals is to stall your opponent, a pseudo-wall is better at that job than a "regular" body.  
For that I rate this higher than a regular 1/4 3-drop should have.
posts.html:
A 1/4 body is usually dull for 3 mana (Horned Turtle noob days ftw!), but I do have to say that it blends pretty well with the extort mechanic, since one of your main goals is to stall your opponent, a pseudo-wall is better at that job than a "regular" body.
For that I rate this higher than a regular 1/4 3-drop should have.

posts.post_content: I find the extort mechanic extremely inefficient. Yes, you could spend 3 black and or white mana for 2 damage to opponent and to gain 3 life, however for one red and one white you could use lightning helix and that can target creatures.
